text: Frank Holmes (b. 1908 d. 1990) was one of Manitoba's first film-makers, filming the documentary Seaport of the Prairies in 1925, when he was just 17 years old. He is also remembered for the documentaries Beyond the Steel and Each Year They Come. Holmes had to go to court to receive his payment for making the film Seaport of the Prairies. In 1928 he produced Forest Fire Fighters of the Skies. The Archives of Manitoba preserves 29 reels of his films. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Canadian documentary filmmakers
title: Frank Holmes (filmmaker)
